############################################################################################################
##################  THIS FILE GENERATED BY PYTHON SCRIPT MEC_Expeditions_Writer.py  ########################
############################################################################################################

# Provinces are eligible expedition targets if neither you nor your subjects own them, and you don't have a truce or alliance with the owner.
MEC_Expeditions_eligible_province_trigger = {
	AND = {
		NOT = {
			country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
		}
		NOT = {
			owner = {
				ROOT = {
					truce_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
		NOT = {
			owner = {
				overlord_of = ROOT
			}
		}
		NOT = {
			owner = {
				OR = {
					alliance_with = ROOT
					overlord = {
						alliance_with = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

MEC_Expeditions_available_british_isles_trigger = { # the British Isles Expedition Availability Conditions
	AND = {
		expedition_provs.british_isles = {
			MEC_Expeditions_eligible_province_trigger = yes
		}
		OR = { # Dip tech requirements based on capital location in trade node
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 43
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_1 # Pacific
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 33
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_40 # Lower Ayeyarwady

			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 31
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_28 # Southern Cone
						province_group = tradenode_71 # Isthmus of Darien

			AND = {
				dip_tech = 30

					OR = {

			AND = {
				dip_tech = 28

MEC_Expeditions_available_northern_europe_trigger = { # Northern Europe Expedition Availability Conditions
	AND = {
		expedition_provs.northern_europe = {
			MEC_Expeditions_eligible_province_trigger = yes
		}

				dip_tech = 43

MEC_Expeditions_available_france_trigger = { # France Expedition Availability Conditions
	AND = {
		expedition_provs.france = {
			MEC_Expeditions_eligible_province_trigger = yes
		}
		OR = { # Dip tech requirements based on capital location in trade node
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 43
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_1 # Pacific
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 33
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_40 # Lower Ayeyarwady

						province_group = tradenode_105 # Lower Danube
						province_group = tradenode_106 # Middle Danube
						province_group = tradenode_116 # Eastern Baltic
						province_group = tradenode_96 # Vistula
						province_group = tradenode_93 # Black Sea
						province_group = tradenode_82 # Western Siberia
						province_group = tradenode_89 # Dnipro
						province_group = tradenode_84 # Volga
						province_group = tradenode_81 # Great Steppe
						province_group = tradenode_83 # Caspian Sea
						province_group = tradenode_95 # Zalesye
						province_group = tradenode_90 # Caucasus
						province_group = tradenode_91 # Anatolia
						province_group = tradenode_79 # Sahara
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 23
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_109 # Iberia
						province_group = tradenode_114 # Bay of Biscay
						province_group = tradenode_115 # France
						province_group = tradenode_121 # North Sea
						province_group = tradenode_123 # Channel
						province_group = tradenode_118 # Norwegian Sea
						province_group = tradenode_120 # Western Baltic
						province_group = tradenode_112 # Rhineland
						province_group = tradenode_111 # Upper Danube
						province_group = tradenode_119 # Elbe
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

MEC_Expeditions_available_iberia_trigger = { # Iberia Expedition Availability Conditions
	AND = {
		expedition_provs.iberia = {
			MEC_Expeditions_eligible_province_trigger = yes
		}
		OR = { # Dip tech requirements based on capital location in trade node
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 43
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_1 # Pacific
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 33
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_40 # Lower Ayeyarwady
						province_group = tradenode_39 # Upper Ayeyarwady
						province_group = tradenode_38 # Malacca Strait
						province_group = tradenode_30 # Mekong
						province_group = tradenode_32 # Chao Phraya
						province_group = tradenode_37 # Sunda Strait
						province_group = tradenode_34 # Champa Sea
						province_group = tradenode_33 # Moluccas
						province_group = tradenode_2 # Australia
						province_group = tradenode_29 # Liangguang
						province_group = tradenode_20 # Szechwan
						province_group = tradenode_18 # Huazhong
						province_group = tradenode_10 # Jiangxi
						province_group = tradenode_5 # Jiangnan
						province_group = tradenode_11 # Fujian
						province_group = tradenode_13 # Huabei
						province_group = tradenode_21 # Xibei
						province_group = tradenode_4 # Zhongyuan
						province_group = tradenode_3 # Huai He
						province_group = tradenode_12 # Eastern Siberia
						province_group = tradenode_6 # East Sea
						province_group = tradenode_9 # Nippon
						province_group = tradenode_8 # Yellow Sea
						province_group = tradenode_7 # Amur
						province_group = tradenode_14 # Western Seaboard
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 32
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_64 # Red Sea
						province_group = tradenode_59 # Abyssinian Highlands
						province_group = tradenode_60 # Upper Nile
						province_group = tradenode_85 # Jazira
						province_group = tradenode_62 # Arabian Peninsula
						province_group = tradenode_63 # Arabian Gulf
						province_group = tradenode_61 # Iran
						province_group = tradenode_47 # Khorasan
						province_group = tradenode_46 # Mawarannahr
						province_group = tradenode_44 # Tarim Basin
						province_group = tradenode_45 # Punjab
						province_group = tradenode_58 # Sindh
						province_group = tradenode_57 # Gurjaratra
						province_group = tradenode_56 # Konkan
						province_group = tradenode_51 # Northern Deccan
						province_group = tradenode_50 # Southern Deccan
						province_group = tradenode_55 # Tamilakam
						province_group = tradenode_54 # Kalinga
						province_group = tradenode_49 # Gondwana
						province_group = tradenode_53 # Malwa
						province_group = tradenode_52 # Rajasthan
						province_group = tradenode_43 # Doab
						province_group = tradenode_42 # Bihar
						province_group = tradenode_41 # Assam
						province_group = tradenode_48 # Bengal
						province_group = tradenode_36 # Himalayas
						province_group = tradenode_35 # Tibetan Plateau
						province_group = tradenode_19 # Guangxi
						province_group = tradenode_31 # Yunnan
						province_group = tradenode_26 # Chala
						province_group = tradenode_25 # Southern Andes
						province_group = tradenode_24 # Central Andes
						province_group = tradenode_22 # Amazonia
						province_group = tradenode_23 # Cerrado
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 31
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_28 # Southern Cone
						province_group = tradenode_71 # Isthmus of Darien
						province_group = tradenode_17 # Valley of Mexico
						province_group = tradenode_15 # Western Valley
						province_group = tradenode_70 # Gulf of Mexico
						province_group = tradenode_16 # Gulf of Tehuantepec
						province_group = tradenode_99 # Rio Grande
						province_group = tradenode_100 # Mississippi
						province_group = tradenode_97 # Western Cordillera
						province_group = tradenode_98 # Plains
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 30
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_69 # South Africa
						province_group = tradenode_65 # Central Africa
						province_group = tradenode_66 # Monomotapa
						province_group = tradenode_67 # Somalia
						province_group = tradenode_68 # Zanj
						province_group = tradenode_72 # Guiana
						province_group = tradenode_27 # Northern Andes
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 29
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_102 # Caribbean
						province_group = tradenode_103 # Eastern Seaboard
						province_group = tradenode_101 # Great Lakes
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 28
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_73 # Kongo
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 27
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_75 # Guinea Coast
						province_group = tradenode_74 # Volta
						province_group = tradenode_76 # Lower Niger
						province_group = tradenode_77 # Lake Tchad
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 26
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_80 # Senegambia
						province_group = tradenode_78 # Upper Niger
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 25
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_108 # Alboran Sea
						province_group = tradenode_113 # Gulf of Lion
						province_group = tradenode_114 # Bay of Biscay
						province_group = tradenode_115 # France
						province_group = tradenode_121 # North Sea
						province_group = tradenode_123 # Channel
						province_group = tradenode_118 # Norwegian Sea
						province_group = tradenode_120 # Western Baltic
						province_group = tradenode_87 # Berber Coast
						province_group = tradenode_86 # Maghreb
						province_group = tradenode_122 # Tyrrenean Sea
						province_group = tradenode_112 # Rhineland
						province_group = tradenode_111 # Upper Danube
						province_group = tradenode_88 # Lower Nile
						province_group = tradenode_110 # Po Valley
						province_group = tradenode_117 # Adriatic Sea
						province_group = tradenode_94 # Levantine Sea
						province_group = tradenode_107 # Aegean Sea
						province_group = tradenode_92 # Dniester
						province_group = tradenode_105 # Lower Danube
						province_group = tradenode_106 # Middle Danube
						province_group = tradenode_119 # Elbe
						province_group = tradenode_116 # Eastern Baltic
						province_group = tradenode_96 # Vistula
						province_group = tradenode_93 # Black Sea
						province_group = tradenode_82 # Western Siberia
						province_group = tradenode_89 # Dnipro
						province_group = tradenode_84 # Volga
						province_group = tradenode_81 # Great Steppe
						province_group = tradenode_83 # Caspian Sea
						province_group = tradenode_95 # Zalesye
						province_group = tradenode_90 # Caucasus
						province_group = tradenode_91 # Anatolia
						province_group = tradenode_79 # Sahara
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 23
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_109 # Iberia
						province_group = tradenode_104 # Strait of Gibraltar
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

MEC_Expeditions_available_iberian_islands_trigger = { # the Iberian Islands Expedition Availability Conditions
	AND = {
		expedition_provs.iberian_islands = {
			MEC_Expeditions_eligible_province_trigger = yes
		}
		OR = { # Dip tech requirements based on capital location in trade node
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 43
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_1 # Pacific
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 33
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_2 # Australia
						province_group = tradenode_29 # Liangguang
						province_group = tradenode_20 # Szechwan

						province_group = tradenode_8 # Yellow Sea
						province_group = tradenode_7 # Amur

			}
			AND = {

					OR = {

MEC_Expeditions_available_northwest_africa_trigger = { # Northwest Africa Expedition Availability Conditions
	AND = {
		expedition_provs.northwest_africa = {
			MEC_Expeditions_eligible_province_trigger = yes
		}
		OR = { # Dip tech requirements based on capital location in trade node
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 43
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_1 # Pacific
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 33
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_2 # Australia
						province_group = tradenode_29 # Liangguang
						province_group = tradenode_20 # Szechwan
						province_group = tradenode_18 # Huazhong
						province_group = tradenode_10 # Jiangxi
						province_group = tradenode_5 # Jiangnan
						province_group = tradenode_11 # Fujian
						province_group = tradenode_13 # Huabei
						province_group = tradenode_21 # Xibei
						province_group = tradenode_4 # Zhongyuan
						province_group = tradenode_3 # Huai He
						province_group = tradenode_12 # Eastern Siberia
						province_group = tradenode_6 # East Sea
						province_group = tradenode_9 # Nippon
						province_group = tradenode_8 # Yellow Sea
						province_group = tradenode_7 # Amur
						province_group = tradenode_14 # Western Seaboard
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 32
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_64 # Red Sea
						province_group = tradenode_59 # Abyssinian Highlands
						province_group = tradenode_60 # Upper Nile

						province_group = tradenode_47 # Khorasan
						province_group = tradenode_46 # Mawarannahr

						province_group = tradenode_49 # Gondwana

						province_group = tradenode_52 # Rajasthan
						province_group = tradenode_43 # Doab
						province_group = tradenode_42 # Bihar

			AND = {

				dip_tech = 26
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_80 # Senegambia
						province_group = tradenode_78 # Upper Niger
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 25
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_108 # Alboran Sea
						province_group = tradenode_113 # Gulf of Lion
						province_group = tradenode_114 # Bay of Biscay
						province_group = tradenode_115 # France
						province_group = tradenode_121 # North Sea
						province_group = tradenode_123 # Channel
						province_group = tradenode_118 # Norwegian Sea
						province_group = tradenode_120 # Western Baltic
						province_group = tradenode_87 # Berber Coast
						province_group = tradenode_86 # Maghreb
						province_group = tradenode_122 # Tyrrenean Sea
						province_group = tradenode_112 # Rhineland
						province_group = tradenode_111 # Upper Danube
						province_group = tradenode_88 # Lower Nile
						province_group = tradenode_110 # Po Valley
						province_group = tradenode_117 # Adriatic Sea
						province_group = tradenode_94 # Levantine Sea
						province_group = tradenode_107 # Aegean Sea
						province_group = tradenode_92 # Dniester
						province_group = tradenode_105 # Lower Danube
						province_group = tradenode_106 # Middle Danube
						province_group = tradenode_119 # Elbe
						province_group = tradenode_116 # Eastern Baltic
						province_group = tradenode_96 # Vistula
						province_group = tradenode_93 # Black Sea
						province_group = tradenode_82 # Western Siberia
						province_group = tradenode_89 # Dnipro
						province_group = tradenode_84 # Volga
						province_group = tradenode_81 # Great Steppe
						province_group = tradenode_83 # Caspian Sea
						province_group = tradenode_95 # Zalesye
						province_group = tradenode_90 # Caucasus
						province_group = tradenode_91 # Anatolia
						province_group = tradenode_79 # Sahara
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 23
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_109 # Iberia
						province_group = tradenode_104 # Strait of Gibraltar
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

MEC_Expeditions_available_west_africa_trigger = { # West Africa Expedition Availability Conditions
	AND = {
		expedition_provs.west_africa = {
			MEC_Expeditions_eligible_province_trigger = yes
		}
		OR = { # Dip tech requirements based on capital location in trade node
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 43
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_1 # Pacific
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 32
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_42 # Bihar
						province_group = tradenode_41 # Assam
						province_group = tradenode_2 # Australia
						province_group = tradenode_29 # Liangguang
						province_group = tradenode_20 # Szechwan
						province_group = tradenode_18 # Huazhong
						province_group = tradenode_10 # Jiangxi
						province_group = tradenode_5 # Jiangnan
						province_group = tradenode_11 # Fujian
						province_group = tradenode_13 # Huabei
						province_group = tradenode_21 # Xibei
						province_group = tradenode_4 # Zhongyuan
						province_group = tradenode_3 # Huai He
						province_group = tradenode_12 # Eastern Siberia
						province_group = tradenode_6 # East Sea
						province_group = tradenode_9 # Nippon
						province_group = tradenode_8 # Yellow Sea
						province_group = tradenode_7 # Amur
						province_group = tradenode_14 # Western Seaboard
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 31
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_40 # Lower Ayeyarwady
						province_group = tradenode_39 # Upper Ayeyarwady
						province_group = tradenode_38 # Malacca Strait
						province_group = tradenode_30 # Mekong
						province_group = tradenode_32 # Chao Phraya
						province_group = tradenode_37 # Sunda Strait
						province_group = tradenode_34 # Champa Sea
						province_group = tradenode_33 # Moluccas
						province_group = tradenode_26 # Chala
						province_group = tradenode_25 # Southern Andes
						province_group = tradenode_24 # Central Andes
						province_group = tradenode_22 # Amazonia
						province_group = tradenode_23 # Cerrado
						province_group = tradenode_71 # Isthmus of Darien
						province_group = tradenode_17 # Valley of Mexico
						province_group = tradenode_15 # Western Valley
						province_group = tradenode_70 # Gulf of Mexico
						province_group = tradenode_16 # Gulf of Tehuantepec
						province_group = tradenode_99 # Rio Grande
						province_group = tradenode_100 # Mississippi
						province_group = tradenode_97 # Western Cordillera
						province_group = tradenode_98 # Plains
						province_group = tradenode_103 # Eastern Seaboard
						province_group = tradenode_101 # Great Lakes
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 30
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_64 # Red Sea
						province_group = tradenode_59 # Abyssinian Highlands
						province_group = tradenode_60 # Upper Nile
						province_group = tradenode_85 # Jazira
						province_group = tradenode_62 # Arabian Peninsula
						province_group = tradenode_63 # Arabian Gulf
						province_group = tradenode_61 # Iran
						province_group = tradenode_47 # Khorasan
						province_group = tradenode_46 # Mawarannahr
						province_group = tradenode_44 # Tarim Basin
						province_group = tradenode_45 # Punjab
						province_group = tradenode_58 # Sindh
						province_group = tradenode_57 # Gurjaratra
						province_group = tradenode_56 # Konkan
						province_group = tradenode_51 # Northern Deccan
						province_group = tradenode_50 # Southern Deccan
						province_group = tradenode_55 # Tamilakam
						province_group = tradenode_54 # Kalinga
						province_group = tradenode_49 # Gondwana
						province_group = tradenode_53 # Malwa
						province_group = tradenode_52 # Rajasthan
						province_group = tradenode_43 # Doab
						province_group = tradenode_48 # Bengal
						province_group = tradenode_36 # Himalayas
						province_group = tradenode_35 # Tibetan Plateau
						province_group = tradenode_19 # Guangxi
						province_group = tradenode_31 # Yunnan
						province_group = tradenode_28 # Southern Cone
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 29
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_102 # Caribbean
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 28
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_65 # Central Africa
						province_group = tradenode_66 # Monomotapa
						province_group = tradenode_67 # Somalia
						province_group = tradenode_68 # Zanj
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 27
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_108 # Alboran Sea
						province_group = tradenode_113 # Gulf of Lion
						province_group = tradenode_114 # Bay of Biscay
						province_group = tradenode_115 # France
						province_group = tradenode_121 # North Sea
						province_group = tradenode_123 # Channel
						province_group = tradenode_118 # Norwegian Sea
						province_group = tradenode_120 # Western Baltic
						province_group = tradenode_87 # Berber Coast
						province_group = tradenode_86 # Maghreb
						province_group = tradenode_122 # Tyrrenean Sea
						province_group = tradenode_112 # Rhineland
						province_group = tradenode_111 # Upper Danube
						province_group = tradenode_88 # Lower Nile
						province_group = tradenode_110 # Po Valley
						province_group = tradenode_117 # Adriatic Sea
						province_group = tradenode_94 # Levantine Sea
						province_group = tradenode_107 # Aegean Sea
						province_group = tradenode_92 # Dniester
						province_group = tradenode_105 # Lower Danube
						province_group = tradenode_106 # Middle Danube
						province_group = tradenode_119 # Elbe
						province_group = tradenode_116 # Eastern Baltic
						province_group = tradenode_96 # Vistula
						province_group = tradenode_93 # Black Sea
						province_group = tradenode_82 # Western Siberia
						province_group = tradenode_89 # Dnipro
						province_group = tradenode_84 # Volga
						province_group = tradenode_81 # Great Steppe
						province_group = tradenode_83 # Caspian Sea
						province_group = tradenode_95 # Zalesye
						province_group = tradenode_90 # Caucasus
						province_group = tradenode_91 # Anatolia
						province_group = tradenode_69 # South Africa
						province_group = tradenode_72 # Guiana
						province_group = tradenode_27 # Northern Andes
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 26
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_109 # Iberia
						province_group = tradenode_104 # Strait of Gibraltar
						province_group = tradenode_79 # Sahara
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 25
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_73 # Kongo
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 23
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_80 # Senegambia
						province_group = tradenode_78 # Upper Niger
						province_group = tradenode_75 # Guinea Coast
						province_group = tradenode_74 # Volta
						province_group = tradenode_76 # Lower Niger
						province_group = tradenode_77 # Lake Tchad
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

MEC_Expeditions_available_gulf_of_guinea_trigger = { # the Gulf of Guinea Expedition Availability Conditions
	AND = {
		expedition_provs.gulf_of_guinea = {
			MEC_Expeditions_eligible_province_trigger = yes
		}
		OR = { # Dip tech requirements based on capital location in trade node
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 43
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_1 # Pacific
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 32
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_2 # Australia
						province_group = tradenode_29 # Liangguang
						province_group = tradenode_20 # Szechwan
						province_group = tradenode_18 # Huazhong
						province_group = tradenode_10 # Jiangxi
						province_group = tradenode_5 # Jiangnan

						province_group = tradenode_13 # Huabei
						province_group = tradenode_21 # Xibei
						province_group = tradenode_4 # Zhongyuan
						province_group = tradenode_3 # Huai He
						province_group = tradenode_12 # Eastern Siberia
						province_group = tradenode_6 # East Sea
						province_group = tradenode_9 # Nippon
						province_group = tradenode_8 # Yellow Sea
						province_group = tradenode_7 # Amur
						province_group = tradenode_14 # Western Seaboard
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 31
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_85 # Jazira

						province_group = tradenode_51 # Northern Deccan
						province_group = tradenode_50 # Southern Deccan

						province_group = tradenode_54 # Kalinga
						province_group = tradenode_49 # Gondwana

						province_group = tradenode_15 # Western Valley
						province_group = tradenode_70 # Gulf of Mexico
						province_group = tradenode_16 # Gulf of Tehuantepec
						province_group = tradenode_99 # Rio Grande
						province_group = tradenode_100 # Mississippi
						province_group = tradenode_97 # Western Cordillera
						province_group = tradenode_98 # Plains
						province_group = tradenode_103 # Eastern Seaboard
						province_group = tradenode_101 # Great Lakes
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 30
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_64 # Red Sea
						province_group = tradenode_59 # Abyssinian Highlands
						province_group = tradenode_60 # Upper Nile
						province_group = tradenode_28 # Southern Cone

				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 29
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_102 # Caribbean
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 28
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_108 # Alboran Sea

						province_group = tradenode_123 # Channel
						province_group = tradenode_118 # Norwegian Sea
						province_group = tradenode_120 # Western Baltic
						province_group = tradenode_87 # Berber Coast
						province_group = tradenode_86 # Maghreb
						province_group = tradenode_122 # Tyrrenean Sea
						province_group = tradenode_112 # Rhineland
						province_group = tradenode_111 # Upper Danube
						province_group = tradenode_88 # Lower Nile
						province_group = tradenode_110 # Po Valley
						province_group = tradenode_117 # Adriatic Sea
						province_group = tradenode_94 # Levantine Sea
						province_group = tradenode_107 # Aegean Sea
						province_group = tradenode_92 # Dniester
						province_group = tradenode_105 # Lower Danube
						province_group = tradenode_106 # Middle Danube
						province_group = tradenode_119 # Elbe
						province_group = tradenode_116 # Eastern Baltic
						province_group = tradenode_96 # Vistula
						province_group = tradenode_93 # Black Sea
						province_group = tradenode_82 # Western Siberia
						province_group = tradenode_89 # Dnipro
						province_group = tradenode_84 # Volga
						province_group = tradenode_81 # Great Steppe
						province_group = tradenode_83 # Caspian Sea
						province_group = tradenode_95 # Zalesye
						province_group = tradenode_90 # Caucasus
						province_group = tradenode_91 # Anatolia
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 27
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_109 # Iberia
						province_group = tradenode_104 # Strait of Gibraltar
						province_group = tradenode_69 # South Africa
						province_group = tradenode_65 # Central Africa
						province_group = tradenode_66 # Monomotapa
						province_group = tradenode_67 # Somalia
						province_group = tradenode_68 # Zanj
						province_group = tradenode_72 # Guiana
						province_group = tradenode_27 # Northern Andes
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 26
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_79 # Sahara
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 23
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_80 # Senegambia
						province_group = tradenode_78 # Upper Niger
						province_group = tradenode_75 # Guinea Coast
						province_group = tradenode_74 # Volta
						province_group = tradenode_76 # Lower Niger
						province_group = tradenode_77 # Lake Tchad
						province_group = tradenode_73 # Kongo
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

MEC_Expeditions_available_central_africa_trigger = { # Central Africa Expedition Availability Conditions
	AND = {
		expedition_provs.central_africa = {
			MEC_Expeditions_eligible_province_trigger = yes
		}
		OR = { # Dip tech requirements based on capital location in trade node
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 43
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_1 # Pacific
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 32
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_14 # Western Seaboard
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 31
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_2 # Australia
						province_group = tradenode_29 # Liangguang
						province_group = tradenode_20 # Szechwan
						province_group = tradenode_18 # Huazhong
						province_group = tradenode_10 # Jiangxi
						province_group = tradenode_5 # Jiangnan
						province_group = tradenode_11 # Fujian
						province_group = tradenode_13 # Huabei
						province_group = tradenode_21 # Xibei
						province_group = tradenode_4 # Zhongyuan
						province_group = tradenode_3 # Huai He
						province_group = tradenode_12 # Eastern Siberia
						province_group = tradenode_6 # East Sea
						province_group = tradenode_9 # Nippon
						province_group = tradenode_8 # Yellow Sea
						province_group = tradenode_7 # Amur
						province_group = tradenode_26 # Chala
						province_group = tradenode_25 # Southern Andes
						province_group = tradenode_24 # Central Andes
						province_group = tradenode_22 # Amazonia
						province_group = tradenode_23 # Cerrado
						province_group = tradenode_71 # Isthmus of Darien
						province_group = tradenode_17 # Valley of Mexico
						province_group = tradenode_15 # Western Valley
						province_group = tradenode_70 # Gulf of Mexico
						province_group = tradenode_16 # Gulf of Tehuantepec
						province_group = tradenode_99 # Rio Grande
						province_group = tradenode_100 # Mississippi
						province_group = tradenode_97 # Western Cordillera
						province_group = tradenode_98 # Plains
						province_group = tradenode_103 # Eastern Seaboard
						province_group = tradenode_101 # Great Lakes
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 30
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_85 # Jazira
						province_group = tradenode_62 # Arabian Peninsula
						province_group = tradenode_63 # Arabian Gulf
						province_group = tradenode_61 # Iran
						province_group = tradenode_47 # Khorasan
						province_group = tradenode_46 # Mawarannahr
						province_group = tradenode_44 # Tarim Basin
						province_group = tradenode_45 # Punjab
						province_group = tradenode_58 # Sindh
						province_group = tradenode_57 # Gurjaratra
						province_group = tradenode_56 # Konkan
						province_group = tradenode_51 # Northern Deccan
						province_group = tradenode_50 # Southern Deccan
						province_group = tradenode_55 # Tamilakam
						province_group = tradenode_54 # Kalinga
						province_group = tradenode_49 # Gondwana
						province_group = tradenode_53 # Malwa
						province_group = tradenode_52 # Rajasthan
						province_group = tradenode_43 # Doab
						province_group = tradenode_42 # Bihar
						province_group = tradenode_41 # Assam
						province_group = tradenode_48 # Bengal
						province_group = tradenode_36 # Himalayas
						province_group = tradenode_35 # Tibetan Plateau
						province_group = tradenode_19 # Guangxi
						province_group = tradenode_31 # Yunnan
						province_group = tradenode_40 # Lower Ayeyarwady
						province_group = tradenode_39 # Upper Ayeyarwady
						province_group = tradenode_38 # Malacca Strait
						province_group = tradenode_30 # Mekong
						province_group = tradenode_32 # Chao Phraya
						province_group = tradenode_37 # Sunda Strait
						province_group = tradenode_34 # Champa Sea
						province_group = tradenode_33 # Moluccas
						province_group = tradenode_28 # Southern Cone
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 29
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_108 # Alboran Sea
						province_group = tradenode_113 # Gulf of Lion
						province_group = tradenode_114 # Bay of Biscay
						province_group = tradenode_115 # France
						province_group = tradenode_121 # North Sea
						province_group = tradenode_123 # Channel
						province_group = tradenode_118 # Norwegian Sea
						province_group = tradenode_120 # Western Baltic
						province_group = tradenode_87 # Berber Coast
						province_group = tradenode_86 # Maghreb
						province_group = tradenode_122 # Tyrrenean Sea
						province_group = tradenode_112 # Rhineland
						province_group = tradenode_111 # Upper Danube
						province_group = tradenode_88 # Lower Nile
						province_group = tradenode_110 # Po Valley
						province_group = tradenode_117 # Adriatic Sea
						province_group = tradenode_94 # Levantine Sea
						province_group = tradenode_107 # Aegean Sea
						province_group = tradenode_92 # Dniester
						province_group = tradenode_105 # Lower Danube
						province_group = tradenode_106 # Middle Danube
						province_group = tradenode_119 # Elbe
						province_group = tradenode_116 # Eastern Baltic
						province_group = tradenode_96 # Vistula
						province_group = tradenode_93 # Black Sea
						province_group = tradenode_82 # Western Siberia
						province_group = tradenode_89 # Dnipro
						province_group = tradenode_84 # Volga
						province_group = tradenode_81 # Great Steppe
						province_group = tradenode_83 # Caspian Sea
						province_group = tradenode_95 # Zalesye
						province_group = tradenode_90 # Caucasus
						province_group = tradenode_91 # Anatolia
						province_group = tradenode_64 # Red Sea
						province_group = tradenode_59 # Abyssinian Highlands
						province_group = tradenode_60 # Upper Nile
						province_group = tradenode_102 # Caribbean
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 28
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_109 # Iberia
						province_group = tradenode_104 # Strait of Gibraltar
						province_group = tradenode_72 # Guiana
						province_group = tradenode_27 # Northern Andes
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 27
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_79 # Sahara
						province_group = tradenode_65 # Central Africa
						province_group = tradenode_66 # Monomotapa
						province_group = tradenode_67 # Somalia
						province_group = tradenode_68 # Zanj
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 25
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_80 # Senegambia
						province_group = tradenode_69 # South Africa
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 23
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_78 # Upper Niger
						province_group = tradenode_75 # Guinea Coast
						province_group = tradenode_74 # Volta
						province_group = tradenode_76 # Lower Niger
						province_group = tradenode_77 # Lake Tchad
						province_group = tradenode_73 # Kongo
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

MEC_Expeditions_available_south_africa_trigger = { # South Africa Expedition Availability Conditions
	AND = {
		expedition_provs.south_africa = {
			MEC_Expeditions_eligible_province_trigger = yes
		}
		OR = { # Dip tech requirements based on capital location in trade node
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 43
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_1 # Pacific
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 32
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_14 # Western Seaboard
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 31
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_2 # Australia
						province_group = tradenode_4 # Zhongyuan
						province_group = tradenode_3 # Huai He
						province_group = tradenode_12 # Eastern Siberia
						province_group = tradenode_6 # East Sea
						province_group = tradenode_9 # Nippon
						province_group = tradenode_8 # Yellow Sea
						province_group = tradenode_7 # Amur
						province_group = tradenode_26 # Chala
						province_group = tradenode_25 # Southern Andes
						province_group = tradenode_24 # Central Andes
						province_group = tradenode_22 # Amazonia
						province_group = tradenode_23 # Cerrado
						province_group = tradenode_71 # Isthmus of Darien
						province_group = tradenode_17 # Valley of Mexico
						province_group = tradenode_15 # Western Valley
						province_group = tradenode_70 # Gulf of Mexico
						province_group = tradenode_16 # Gulf of Tehuantepec
						province_group = tradenode_99 # Rio Grande
						province_group = tradenode_100 # Mississippi
						province_group = tradenode_97 # Western Cordillera
						province_group = tradenode_98 # Plains
						province_group = tradenode_103 # Eastern Seaboard
						province_group = tradenode_101 # Great Lakes
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 30
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_109 # Iberia
						province_group = tradenode_104 # Strait of Gibraltar
						province_group = tradenode_108 # Alboran Sea
						province_group = tradenode_113 # Gulf of Lion
						province_group = tradenode_114 # Bay of Biscay
						province_group = tradenode_115 # France
						province_group = tradenode_121 # North Sea
						province_group = tradenode_123 # Channel
						province_group = tradenode_118 # Norwegian Sea
						province_group = tradenode_120 # Western Baltic
						province_group = tradenode_87 # Berber Coast
						province_group = tradenode_86 # Maghreb
						province_group = tradenode_122 # Tyrrenean Sea
						province_group = tradenode_112 # Rhineland
						province_group = tradenode_111 # Upper Danube
						province_group = tradenode_88 # Lower Nile
						province_group = tradenode_110 # Po Valley
						province_group = tradenode_117 # Adriatic Sea
						province_group = tradenode_94 # Levantine Sea
						province_group = tradenode_107 # Aegean Sea
						province_group = tradenode_92 # Dniester
						province_group = tradenode_105 # Lower Danube
						province_group = tradenode_106 # Middle Danube
						province_group = tradenode_119 # Elbe
						province_group = tradenode_116 # Eastern Baltic
						province_group = tradenode_96 # Vistula
						province_group = tradenode_93 # Black Sea
						province_group = tradenode_82 # Western Siberia
						province_group = tradenode_89 # Dnipro
						province_group = tradenode_84 # Volga
						province_group = tradenode_81 # Great Steppe
						province_group = tradenode_83 # Caspian Sea
						province_group = tradenode_95 # Zalesye
						province_group = tradenode_90 # Caucasus
						province_group = tradenode_91 # Anatolia
						province_group = tradenode_40 # Lower Ayeyarwady
						province_group = tradenode_39 # Upper Ayeyarwady
						province_group = tradenode_38 # Malacca Strait
						province_group = tradenode_30 # Mekong
						province_group = tradenode_32 # Chao Phraya
						province_group = tradenode_37 # Sunda Strait
						province_group = tradenode_34 # Champa Sea
						province_group = tradenode_33 # Moluccas
						province_group = tradenode_29 # Liangguang
						province_group = tradenode_20 # Szechwan
						province_group = tradenode_18 # Huazhong
						province_group = tradenode_10 # Jiangxi
						province_group = tradenode_5 # Jiangnan
						province_group = tradenode_11 # Fujian
						province_group = tradenode_13 # Huabei
						province_group = tradenode_21 # Xibei
						province_group = tradenode_28 # Southern Cone
						province_group = tradenode_102 # Caribbean
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 29
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_72 # Guiana
						province_group = tradenode_27 # Northern Andes
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 28
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_79 # Sahara
						province_group = tradenode_58 # Sindh
						province_group = tradenode_57 # Gurjaratra
						province_group = tradenode_56 # Konkan
						province_group = tradenode_51 # Northern Deccan
						province_group = tradenode_50 # Southern Deccan
						province_group = tradenode_55 # Tamilakam
						province_group = tradenode_54 # Kalinga
						province_group = tradenode_49 # Gondwana
						province_group = tradenode_53 # Malwa
						province_group = tradenode_52 # Rajasthan
						province_group = tradenode_43 # Doab
						province_group = tradenode_42 # Bihar
						province_group = tradenode_41 # Assam
						province_group = tradenode_48 # Bengal
						province_group = tradenode_36 # Himalayas
						province_group = tradenode_35 # Tibetan Plateau
						province_group = tradenode_19 # Guangxi
						province_group = tradenode_31 # Yunnan
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 27
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_80 # Senegambia
						province_group = tradenode_78 # Upper Niger
						province_group = tradenode_75 # Guinea Coast
						province_group = tradenode_74 # Volta
						province_group = tradenode_76 # Lower Niger
						province_group = tradenode_77 # Lake Tchad
						province_group = tradenode_85 # Jazira
						province_group = tradenode_62 # Arabian Peninsula
						province_group = tradenode_63 # Arabian Gulf
						province_group = tradenode_61 # Iran
						province_group = tradenode_47 # Khorasan
						province_group = tradenode_46 # Mawarannahr
						province_group = tradenode_44 # Tarim Basin
						province_group = tradenode_45 # Punjab
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 26
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_64 # Red Sea
						province_group = tradenode_59 # Abyssinian Highlands
						province_group = tradenode_60 # Upper Nile
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 25
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_73 # Kongo
						province_group = tradenode_65 # Central Africa
						province_group = tradenode_66 # Monomotapa
						province_group = tradenode_67 # Somalia
						province_group = tradenode_68 # Zanj
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 23
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_69 # South Africa
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

MEC_Expeditions_available_east_africa_trigger = { # East Africa Expedition Availability Conditions
	AND = {
		expedition_provs.east_africa = {
			MEC_Expeditions_eligible_province_trigger = yes
		}
		OR = { # Dip tech requirements based on capital location in trade node
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 43
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_1 # Pacific
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 33
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_14 # Western Seaboard
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 32
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_26 # Chala
						province_group = tradenode_25 # Southern Andes
						province_group = tradenode_24 # Central Andes
						province_group = tradenode_22 # Amazonia
						province_group = tradenode_23 # Cerrado
						province_group = tradenode_71 # Isthmus of Darien
						province_group = tradenode_17 # Valley of Mexico
						province_group = tradenode_15 # Western Valley
						province_group = tradenode_70 # Gulf of Mexico
						province_group = tradenode_16 # Gulf of Tehuantepec
						province_group = tradenode_99 # Rio Grande
						province_group = tradenode_100 # Mississippi
						province_group = tradenode_97 # Western Cordillera
						province_group = tradenode_98 # Plains
						province_group = tradenode_103 # Eastern Seaboard
						province_group = tradenode_101 # Great Lakes
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 31
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_2 # Australia
						province_group = tradenode_4 # Zhongyuan
						province_group = tradenode_3 # Huai He
						province_group = tradenode_12 # Eastern Siberia
						province_group = tradenode_6 # East Sea
						province_group = tradenode_9 # Nippon

						province_group = tradenode_7 # Amur
						province_group = tradenode_28 # Southern Cone
						province_group = tradenode_102 # Caribbean
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 30
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_109 # Iberia
						province_group = tradenode_104 # Strait of Gibraltar

						province_group = tradenode_114 # Bay of Biscay
						province_group = tradenode_115 # France
						province_group = tradenode_121 # North Sea
						province_group = tradenode_123 # Channel
						province_group = tradenode_118 # Norwegian Sea
						province_group = tradenode_120 # Western Baltic
						province_group = tradenode_87 # Berber Coast
						province_group = tradenode_86 # Maghreb
						province_group = tradenode_122 # Tyrrenean Sea
						province_group = tradenode_112 # Rhineland
						province_group = tradenode_111 # Upper Danube
						province_group = tradenode_110 # Po Valley
						province_group = tradenode_117 # Adriatic Sea
						province_group = tradenode_94 # Levantine Sea
						province_group = tradenode_107 # Aegean Sea
						province_group = tradenode_92 # Dniester

						province_group = tradenode_96 # Vistula
						province_group = tradenode_93 # Black Sea
						province_group = tradenode_82 # Western Siberia
						province_group = tradenode_89 # Dnipro
						province_group = tradenode_84 # Volga
						province_group = tradenode_81 # Great Steppe
						province_group = tradenode_83 # Caspian Sea
						province_group = tradenode_95 # Zalesye
						province_group = tradenode_90 # Caucasus
						province_group = tradenode_91 # Anatolia
						province_group = tradenode_30 # Mekong
						province_group = tradenode_32 # Chao Phraya
						province_group = tradenode_37 # Sunda Strait
						province_group = tradenode_34 # Champa Sea
						province_group = tradenode_33 # Moluccas
						province_group = tradenode_29 # Liangguang
						province_group = tradenode_20 # Szechwan
						province_group = tradenode_18 # Huazhong
						province_group = tradenode_10 # Jiangxi
						province_group = tradenode_5 # Jiangnan
						province_group = tradenode_11 # Fujian
						province_group = tradenode_13 # Huabei
						province_group = tradenode_21 # Xibei
						province_group = tradenode_72 # Guiana
						province_group = tradenode_27 # Northern Andes
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 29
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_40 # Lower Ayeyarwady
						province_group = tradenode_39 # Upper Ayeyarwady
						province_group = tradenode_38 # Malacca Strait
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 28
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_88 # Lower Nile
						province_group = tradenode_80 # Senegambia

						province_group = tradenode_74 # Volta
						province_group = tradenode_76 # Lower Niger
						province_group = tradenode_77 # Lake Tchad
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 27
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_75 # Guinea Coast
						province_group = tradenode_73 # Kongo
						province_group = tradenode_58 # Sindh
						province_group = tradenode_57 # Gurjaratra
						province_group = tradenode_56 # Konkan
						province_group = tradenode_51 # Northern Deccan
						province_group = tradenode_50 # Southern Deccan
						province_group = tradenode_55 # Tamilakam
						province_group = tradenode_54 # Kalinga
						province_group = tradenode_49 # Gondwana
						province_group = tradenode_53 # Malwa
						province_group = tradenode_52 # Rajasthan
						province_group = tradenode_43 # Doab
						province_group = tradenode_42 # Bihar
						province_group = tradenode_41 # Assam
						province_group = tradenode_48 # Bengal
						province_group = tradenode_36 # Himalayas
						province_group = tradenode_35 # Tibetan Plateau
						province_group = tradenode_19 # Guangxi
						province_group = tradenode_31 # Yunnan
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 26
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_61 # Iran
						province_group = tradenode_47 # Khorasan
						province_group = tradenode_46 # Mawarannahr
						province_group = tradenode_44 # Tarim Basin
						province_group = tradenode_45 # Punjab
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 25
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_69 # South Africa
						province_group = tradenode_85 # Jazira
						province_group = tradenode_62 # Arabian Peninsula
						province_group = tradenode_63 # Arabian Gulf
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 23
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_65 # Central Africa
						province_group = tradenode_66 # Monomotapa
						province_group = tradenode_67 # Somalia
						province_group = tradenode_68 # Zanj
						province_group = tradenode_64 # Red Sea
						province_group = tradenode_59 # Abyssinian Highlands
						province_group = tradenode_60 # Upper Nile
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

MEC_Expeditions_available_indian_ocean_trigger = { # the Indian Ocean Expedition Availability Conditions
	AND = {
		expedition_provs.indian_ocean = {
			MEC_Expeditions_eligible_province_trigger = yes
		}
		OR = { # Dip tech requirements based on capital location in trade node
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 43
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_1 # Pacific
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 33
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_14 # Western Seaboard
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 32
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_26 # Chala
						province_group = tradenode_25 # Southern Andes
						province_group = tradenode_24 # Central Andes
						province_group = tradenode_22 # Amazonia
						province_group = tradenode_23 # Cerrado

						province_group = tradenode_17 # Valley of Mexico
						province_group = tradenode_15 # Western Valley
						province_group = tradenode_70 # Gulf of Mexico
						province_group = tradenode_16 # Gulf of Tehuantepec
						province_group = tradenode_99 # Rio Grande

						province_group = tradenode_98 # Plains
						province_group = tradenode_103 # Eastern Seaboard
						province_group = tradenode_101 # Great Lakes
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 31
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_2 # Australia
						province_group = tradenode_4 # Zhongyuan

				dip_tech = 30
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_109 # Iberia

						province_group = tradenode_115 # France
						province_group = tradenode_121 # North Sea
						province_group = tradenode_123 # Channel
						province_group = tradenode_118 # Norwegian Sea
						province_group = tradenode_120 # Western Baltic
						province_group = tradenode_87 # Berber Coast
						province_group = tradenode_86 # Maghreb
						province_group = tradenode_122 # Tyrrenean Sea
						province_group = tradenode_112 # Rhineland
						province_group = tradenode_111 # Upper Danube
						province_group = tradenode_110 # Po Valley
						province_group = tradenode_117 # Adriatic Sea

						province_group = tradenode_84 # Volga
						province_group = tradenode_81 # Great Steppe
						province_group = tradenode_83 # Caspian Sea

						province_group = tradenode_91 # Anatolia
						province_group = tradenode_30 # Mekong
						province_group = tradenode_32 # Chao Phraya
						province_group = tradenode_37 # Sunda Strait
						province_group = tradenode_34 # Champa Sea
						province_group = tradenode_33 # Moluccas
						province_group = tradenode_29 # Liangguang
						province_group = tradenode_20 # Szechwan
						province_group = tradenode_18 # Huazhong

						province_group = tradenode_5 # Jiangnan

						province_group = tradenode_13 # Huabei
						province_group = tradenode_21 # Xibei
						province_group = tradenode_72 # Guiana
						province_group = tradenode_27 # Northern Andes
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 29
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_40 # Lower Ayeyarwady
						province_group = tradenode_39 # Upper Ayeyarwady
						province_group = tradenode_38 # Malacca Strait
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 28
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_88 # Lower Nile
						province_group = tradenode_80 # Senegambia
						province_group = tradenode_78 # Upper Niger
						province_group = tradenode_74 # Volta
						province_group = tradenode_76 # Lower Niger
						province_group = tradenode_77 # Lake Tchad
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 27
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_75 # Guinea Coast
						province_group = tradenode_73 # Kongo
						province_group = tradenode_85 # Jazira
						province_group = tradenode_62 # Arabian Peninsula
						province_group = tradenode_63 # Arabian Gulf
						province_group = tradenode_61 # Iran
						province_group = tradenode_47 # Khorasan
						province_group = tradenode_46 # Mawarannahr
						province_group = tradenode_44 # Tarim Basin
						province_group = tradenode_45 # Punjab
						province_group = tradenode_58 # Sindh
						province_group = tradenode_57 # Gurjaratra
						province_group = tradenode_56 # Konkan
						province_group = tradenode_51 # Northern Deccan
						province_group = tradenode_50 # Southern Deccan
						province_group = tradenode_55 # Tamilakam
						province_group = tradenode_54 # Kalinga
						province_group = tradenode_49 # Gondwana
						province_group = tradenode_53 # Malwa
						province_group = tradenode_52 # Rajasthan
						province_group = tradenode_43 # Doab
						province_group = tradenode_42 # Bihar
						province_group = tradenode_41 # Assam
						province_group = tradenode_48 # Bengal
						province_group = tradenode_36 # Himalayas
						province_group = tradenode_35 # Tibetan Plateau
						province_group = tradenode_19 # Guangxi
						province_group = tradenode_31 # Yunnan
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 25
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_69 # South Africa
						province_group = tradenode_64 # Red Sea
						province_group = tradenode_59 # Abyssinian Highlands
						province_group = tradenode_60 # Upper Nile
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 23
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_65 # Central Africa
						province_group = tradenode_66 # Monomotapa
						province_group = tradenode_67 # Somalia
						province_group = tradenode_68 # Zanj
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

MEC_Expeditions_available_arabia_trigger = { # Arabia Expedition Availability Conditions
	AND = {
		expedition_provs.arabia = {
			MEC_Expeditions_eligible_province_trigger = yes
		}
		OR = { # Dip tech requirements based on capital location in trade node
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 43
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_1 # Pacific
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 33
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_14 # Western Seaboard
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 32
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_26 # Chala
						province_group = tradenode_25 # Southern Andes
						province_group = tradenode_24 # Central Andes
						province_group = tradenode_22 # Amazonia
						province_group = tradenode_23 # Cerrado
						province_group = tradenode_71 # Isthmus of Darien
						province_group = tradenode_17 # Valley of Mexico
						province_group = tradenode_15 # Western Valley
						province_group = tradenode_70 # Gulf of Mexico
						province_group = tradenode_16 # Gulf of Tehuantepec
						province_group = tradenode_99 # Rio Grande
						province_group = tradenode_100 # Mississippi
						province_group = tradenode_97 # Western Cordillera
						province_group = tradenode_98 # Plains
						province_group = tradenode_103 # Eastern Seaboard
						province_group = tradenode_101 # Great Lakes
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 31
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_28 # Southern Cone
						province_group = tradenode_102 # Caribbean
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 30
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_109 # Iberia
						province_group = tradenode_104 # Strait of Gibraltar
						province_group = tradenode_79 # Sahara
						province_group = tradenode_108 # Alboran Sea
						province_group = tradenode_113 # Gulf of Lion
						province_group = tradenode_114 # Bay of Biscay
						province_group = tradenode_115 # France
						province_group = tradenode_121 # North Sea
						province_group = tradenode_123 # Channel
						province_group = tradenode_118 # Norwegian Sea
						province_group = tradenode_120 # Western Baltic
						province_group = tradenode_87 # Berber Coast
						province_group = tradenode_86 # Maghreb
						province_group = tradenode_122 # Tyrrenean Sea
						province_group = tradenode_112 # Rhineland
						province_group = tradenode_111 # Upper Danube
						province_group = tradenode_110 # Po Valley
						province_group = tradenode_117 # Adriatic Sea
						province_group = tradenode_94 # Levantine Sea
						province_group = tradenode_107 # Aegean Sea
						province_group = tradenode_92 # Dniester
						province_group = tradenode_105 # Lower Danube
						province_group = tradenode_106 # Middle Danube
						province_group = tradenode_119 # Elbe
						province_group = tradenode_116 # Eastern Baltic
						province_group = tradenode_96 # Vistula
						province_group = tradenode_93 # Black Sea
						province_group = tradenode_82 # Western Siberia
						province_group = tradenode_89 # Dnipro
						province_group = tradenode_84 # Volga
						province_group = tradenode_81 # Great Steppe
						province_group = tradenode_83 # Caspian Sea
						province_group = tradenode_95 # Zalesye
						province_group = tradenode_90 # Caucasus
						province_group = tradenode_91 # Anatolia
						province_group = tradenode_80 # Senegambia
						province_group = tradenode_78 # Upper Niger
						province_group = tradenode_75 # Guinea Coast
						province_group = tradenode_74 # Volta
						province_group = tradenode_76 # Lower Niger
						province_group = tradenode_77 # Lake Tchad
						province_group = tradenode_73 # Kongo
						province_group = tradenode_4 # Zhongyuan
						province_group = tradenode_3 # Huai He
						province_group = tradenode_12 # Eastern Siberia
						province_group = tradenode_6 # East Sea
						province_group = tradenode_9 # Nippon
						province_group = tradenode_8 # Yellow Sea
						province_group = tradenode_7 # Amur
						province_group = tradenode_72 # Guiana
						province_group = tradenode_27 # Northern Andes
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 29
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_2 # Australia
						province_group = tradenode_29 # Liangguang
						province_group = tradenode_20 # Szechwan
						province_group = tradenode_18 # Huazhong
						province_group = tradenode_10 # Jiangxi
						province_group = tradenode_5 # Jiangnan
						province_group = tradenode_11 # Fujian
						province_group = tradenode_13 # Huabei
						province_group = tradenode_21 # Xibei
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 27
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_69 # South Africa
						province_group = tradenode_40 # Lower Ayeyarwady
						province_group = tradenode_39 # Upper Ayeyarwady
						province_group = tradenode_38 # Malacca Strait
						province_group = tradenode_30 # Mekong
						province_group = tradenode_32 # Chao Phraya
						province_group = tradenode_37 # Sunda Strait
						province_group = tradenode_34 # Champa Sea
						province_group = tradenode_33 # Moluccas
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 26
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_88 # Lower Nile
						province_group = tradenode_65 # Central Africa
						province_group = tradenode_66 # Monomotapa
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 25
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_67 # Somalia
						province_group = tradenode_68 # Zanj
						province_group = tradenode_58 # Sindh
						province_group = tradenode_57 # Gurjaratra
						province_group = tradenode_56 # Konkan
						province_group = tradenode_51 # Northern Deccan
						province_group = tradenode_50 # Southern Deccan
						province_group = tradenode_55 # Tamilakam
						province_group = tradenode_54 # Kalinga
						province_group = tradenode_49 # Gondwana
						province_group = tradenode_53 # Malwa
						province_group = tradenode_52 # Rajasthan
						province_group = tradenode_43 # Doab
						province_group = tradenode_42 # Bihar
						province_group = tradenode_41 # Assam
						province_group = tradenode_48 # Bengal
						province_group = tradenode_36 # Himalayas
						province_group = tradenode_35 # Tibetan Plateau
						province_group = tradenode_19 # Guangxi
						province_group = tradenode_31 # Yunnan
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 23
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_64 # Red Sea
						province_group = tradenode_59 # Abyssinian Highlands
						province_group = tradenode_60 # Upper Nile
						province_group = tradenode_85 # Jazira
						province_group = tradenode_62 # Arabian Peninsula
						province_group = tradenode_63 # Arabian Gulf
						province_group = tradenode_61 # Iran
						province_group = tradenode_47 # Khorasan
						province_group = tradenode_46 # Mawarannahr
						province_group = tradenode_44 # Tarim Basin
						province_group = tradenode_45 # Punjab
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

MEC_Expeditions_available_western_india_trigger = { # Western India Expedition Availability Conditions
	AND = {
		expedition_provs.western_india = {
			MEC_Expeditions_eligible_province_trigger = yes
		}
		OR = { # Dip tech requirements based on capital location in trade node
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 43
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_1 # Pacific
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 33
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_26 # Chala
						province_group = tradenode_25 # Southern Andes
						province_group = tradenode_24 # Central Andes
						province_group = tradenode_22 # Amazonia
						province_group = tradenode_23 # Cerrado
						province_group = tradenode_71 # Isthmus of Darien
						province_group = tradenode_17 # Valley of Mexico
						province_group = tradenode_15 # Western Valley
						province_group = tradenode_70 # Gulf of Mexico
						province_group = tradenode_16 # Gulf of Tehuantepec
						province_group = tradenode_99 # Rio Grande
						province_group = tradenode_100 # Mississippi
						province_group = tradenode_97 # Western Cordillera
						province_group = tradenode_98 # Plains
						province_group = tradenode_103 # Eastern Seaboard
						province_group = tradenode_101 # Great Lakes
						province_group = tradenode_14 # Western Seaboard
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 32
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_28 # Southern Cone
						province_group = tradenode_102 # Caribbean
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 31
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_72 # Guiana
						province_group = tradenode_27 # Northern Andes
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 30
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_109 # Iberia
						province_group = tradenode_104 # Strait of Gibraltar

						province_group = tradenode_123 # Channel
						province_group = tradenode_118 # Norwegian Sea
						province_group = tradenode_120 # Western Baltic
						province_group = tradenode_87 # Berber Coast

						province_group = tradenode_122 # Tyrrenean Sea
						province_group = tradenode_112 # Rhineland
						province_group = tradenode_111 # Upper Danube
						province_group = tradenode_110 # Po Valley
						province_group = tradenode_117 # Adriatic Sea
						province_group = tradenode_94 # Levantine Sea
						province_group = tradenode_107 # Aegean Sea
						province_group = tradenode_92 # Dniester
						province_group = tradenode_105 # Lower Danube

						province_group = tradenode_96 # Vistula

						province_group = tradenode_84 # Volga
						province_group = tradenode_81 # Great Steppe
						province_group = tradenode_83 # Caspian Sea

						province_group = tradenode_90 # Caucasus
						province_group = tradenode_91 # Anatolia
						province_group = tradenode_80 # Senegambia
						province_group = tradenode_78 # Upper Niger
						province_group = tradenode_75 # Guinea Coast
						province_group = tradenode_74 # Volta
						province_group = tradenode_76 # Lower Niger
						province_group = tradenode_77 # Lake Tchad
						province_group = tradenode_73 # Kongo
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 29
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_4 # Zhongyuan
						province_group = tradenode_3 # Huai He

						province_group = tradenode_9 # Nippon
						province_group = tradenode_8 # Yellow Sea
						province_group = tradenode_7 # Amur
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 28
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_88 # Lower Nile
						province_group = tradenode_69 # South Africa
						province_group = tradenode_2 # Australia
						province_group = tradenode_29 # Liangguang
						province_group = tradenode_20 # Szechwan
						province_group = tradenode_18 # Huazhong
						province_group = tradenode_10 # Jiangxi
						province_group = tradenode_5 # Jiangnan
						province_group = tradenode_11 # Fujian
						province_group = tradenode_13 # Huabei
						province_group = tradenode_21 # Xibei
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 27
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_65 # Central Africa
						province_group = tradenode_66 # Monomotapa
						province_group = tradenode_67 # Somalia
						province_group = tradenode_68 # Zanj
						province_group = tradenode_40 # Lower Ayeyarwady
						province_group = tradenode_39 # Upper Ayeyarwady

						province_group = tradenode_32 # Chao Phraya
						province_group = tradenode_37 # Sunda Strait
						province_group = tradenode_34 # Champa Sea
						province_group = tradenode_33 # Moluccas
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 25
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_64 # Red Sea
						province_group = tradenode_59 # Abyssinian Highlands
						province_group = tradenode_60 # Upper Nile
						province_group = tradenode_61 # Iran
						province_group = tradenode_47 # Khorasan
						province_group = tradenode_54 # Kalinga
						province_group = tradenode_49 # Gondwana
						province_group = tradenode_48 # Bengal
						province_group = tradenode_36 # Himalayas
						province_group = tradenode_35 # Tibetan Plateau
						province_group = tradenode_19 # Guangxi
						province_group = tradenode_31 # Yunnan
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 23
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_85 # Jazira
						province_group = tradenode_62 # Arabian Peninsula
						province_group = tradenode_63 # Arabian Gulf
						province_group = tradenode_46 # Mawarannahr
						province_group = tradenode_44 # Tarim Basin
						province_group = tradenode_45 # Punjab
						province_group = tradenode_58 # Sindh
						province_group = tradenode_57 # Gurjaratra
						province_group = tradenode_56 # Konkan
						province_group = tradenode_51 # Northern Deccan
						province_group = tradenode_50 # Southern Deccan
						province_group = tradenode_55 # Tamilakam
						province_group = tradenode_53 # Malwa
						province_group = tradenode_52 # Rajasthan
						province_group = tradenode_43 # Doab
						province_group = tradenode_42 # Bihar
						province_group = tradenode_41 # Assam
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

MEC_Expeditions_available_southern_india_trigger = { # Southern India Expedition Availability Conditions
	AND = {
		expedition_provs.southern_india = {
			MEC_Expeditions_eligible_province_trigger = yes
		}
		OR = { # Dip tech requirements based on capital location in trade node
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 43
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_1 # Pacific
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 33
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_26 # Chala
						province_group = tradenode_25 # Southern Andes
						province_group = tradenode_24 # Central Andes
						province_group = tradenode_22 # Amazonia
						province_group = tradenode_23 # Cerrado
						province_group = tradenode_71 # Isthmus of Darien
						province_group = tradenode_17 # Valley of Mexico
						province_group = tradenode_15 # Western Valley
						province_group = tradenode_70 # Gulf of Mexico
						province_group = tradenode_16 # Gulf of Tehuantepec
						province_group = tradenode_99 # Rio Grande
						province_group = tradenode_100 # Mississippi
						province_group = tradenode_97 # Western Cordillera
						province_group = tradenode_98 # Plains
						province_group = tradenode_103 # Eastern Seaboard
						province_group = tradenode_101 # Great Lakes
						province_group = tradenode_14 # Western Seaboard
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 32
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_28 # Southern Cone
						province_group = tradenode_102 # Caribbean
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 31
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_72 # Guiana
						province_group = tradenode_27 # Northern Andes
					}
				}
			}
			AND = {
				dip_tech = 30
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						province_group = tradenode_109 # Iberia

						province_group = tradenode_123 # Channel
						province_group = tradenode_118 # Norwegian Sea
						province_group = tradenode_120 # Western Baltic
						province_group = tradenode_87 # Berber Coast
						province_group = tradenode_86 # Maghreb
						province_group = tradenode_122 # Tyrrenean Sea
						province_group = tradenode_112 # Rhineland
						province_group = tradenode_111 # Upper Danube
						province_group = tradenode_110 # Po Valley
						province_group = tradenode_117 # Adriatic Sea
						province_group = tradenode_94 # Levantine Sea
						province_group = tradenode_107 # Aegean Sea
						province_group = tradenode_92 # Dniester
						province_group = tradenode_105 # Lower Danube
						province_group = tradenode_106 # Middle Danube

						province_group = tradenode_96 # Vistula
